skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Skilled in building responsive interfaces with React.js, HTML, CSS, and Tailwind CSS, ensuring a seamless user experience.

skills.title: Back-End Development
skills.description: Experienced in server-side development using Express.js and MongoDB, focusing on creating robust APIs and managing databases.

skills.title: Machine Learning
skills.description: Currently learning machine learning concepts and algorithms, with a focus on applying data analysis techniques and problem-solving.

skills.title: Problem Solving
skills.description: Adept at tackling complex challenges and finding effective solutions through strong problem-solving skills and analytical thinking.

portfolio.title: StudyNotion
portfolio.description: Developed an EdTech platform with MERN stack and Tailwind CSS, featuring user authentication and content management for learning resources.

portfolio.title: News App
portfolio.description: Developed a news application with Text-to-Speech (TTS) functionality for accessibility and integrated an API for fetching and displaying news content.

portfolio.title: Shopping App
portfolio.description: Developed a shopping application where users can add and remove items from the cart, with a summary of the total amount in the cart.

project.title: Tech Blogs
project.description: Created a responsive blog website for publishing tech articles with pagination across multiple pages.

project.title: Review Scrapper
project.description: Built a web app to scrape product reviews from websites and display the data.

project.title: Random GIF Generator
project.description: Created an application that generates random GIFs and allows users to search for specific GIFs.
